page.title:
Creative? (Cont.)
Creative? (Cont.)
page.enlisting:
• Yes, creative languaging requires
• Yes, creative languaging requires greater precision in expression. In order for teachers and students to say precisely what they mean, all have to be very careful in their use of vocabulary and idioms.
greater precision in expression. In order
for teachers and students to say
precisely what they mean, all have to be
very careful in their use of vocabulary
and idioms.
page.normal_text:
• Is it easier to just say what you mean and be done with it? Yes, but where’s the fun in that? (Is the fun factor important in education?)
